name: Enlighten's Fate
description:
In this game, you play as a doodle character and he has to find his way out of a Box in which he was trapped by a mysterious man..

The tutorial level will show you the Story so make sure to watch it!

 TRY IT NOW! Download at the end of the page!!

Jump across dangerous Spikes and Lava Pools and Find your way to escape this Box!





HUGE platformer world to explore!

This Game was Basically Build For the "MiniJam:Doodle"

Music credits :
OVERWERK - Daybreak
OVERWERK s' channel : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJPp8C9j1vIUWA4dSksfZ0g


-> If you liked the game, don't forget to leave a feedback and a cool rating it will help us a lot!
